Interface ListIndexesService


  • public interface ListIndexesService
    Interface representing the ListIndexes API.

      static String URL

      Indexes listIndexes(Map<String,Object> params)
      Query IDOL OnDemand for the list of indexes using an API key provided by a RequestInterceptor

    • Method Detail

      • listIndexes

        @GET(value="/api/sync/listindexes/v1")
Indexes listIndexes(@QueryMap
                      Map<String,Object> params)
                    throws IodErrorException
        Query IDOL OnDemand for the list of indexes using an API key provided by a RequestInterceptor
        Parameters:
        params - Parameters to be sent as part of the request
        Returns:
        A list of available indexes
        Throws:
        IodErrorException

      • listIndexes

        @GET(value="/api/sync/listindexes/v1")
Indexes listIndexes(@Query(value="apiKey")
                      String apiKey,
                      @QueryMap
                      Map<String,Object> params)
                    throws IodErrorException
        Query IDOL OnDemand for indexes using the given API key
        Parameters:
        apiKey - The API key to use to authenticate the request
        params - Parameters to be sent as part of the request
        Returns:
        A list of available indexes
        Throws:
        IodErrorException
